allQuestion.text: Your boss asks to see you in his or her office. You...

answers.text: As much as possible! I visit their work areas to chat, go to lunch with them, and sometimes see them on weekends.
Sometimes, for an occasional happy hour or break.
No. I like to keep to myself, or they don't seem to like me.

allQuestion.text: Do you socialize with your colleagues?

allQuestion.explanation: Want to know how your colleagues see you? Find out your work personality!

answers.text: Ask for as much help as possible. It's all about teamwork!
Get right to it, and put in overtime if necessary.
Break it down into smaller, more manageable tasks, in order of priority.
Put it off until the last minute.

allQuestion.text: You have a big project to tackle. How will you complete it?
